defaultRecipes.name: Acai Smoothie Bowl
defaultRecipes.description: Acai bowls make a great breakfast and giving you two of your five a day
defaultRecipes.steps: Combine acai pulp, 2/3 of the banana, and 2 tablespoons of soy milk in a blender; blend until smooth, but still thick. Add more soy milk as needed; smoothie should have the consistency of frozen yogurt.....
